Articles.Content:
Been having this issue for a while and I can't find anything about it online, so I thought I'd ask here:

So I installed a 1.7.3 modded KSP game, and any time science is transmitted on ANY of my crafts (doesn't have to be the active vessel), these annoying "+0.0 (Science Transmitted)" messages appear floating above my craft, or under the science counter in the KSC screen. They also still appear even when I turn off the HUD.

Does anyone know what mod they're from and how to disable them? I was thinking Kerbalism, but I can't find anything in the settings.cfg to disable them.

My mod list:

Edited September 11, 2019 by nubcaker

Wait, I might have figured it out! Apparently, the blue message pop-ups are from an (outdated) mod called Strategia, and it doesn't play well with Kerbalism, which relies on constant transmission of science. I'm going to try disabling Strategia and see if that solves the issue.
Hey Nubcaker, mind letting me know if that resolved the issue? I am having the same issue but I like working with Strategia and would prefer not to disable it...
